attributes.action: The UK should implement a near-zero CO2 plan now. We have the technology.
attributes.additional_details:
My self-funding near-zero CO2 plan, in full, can be seen at: http://www.kadir-buxton.com/near-zero-co2-plan

Another is a book: "All-Electric America" by S. David Freeman & 
Leah Y Parks. Solar Flare Press

There have been other such plans mooted over the years, mine has been around since the 1980s.
attributes.background: My plan can be paid for by eliminating mental illness using the Kadir-Buxton Method. Existing power stations can be converted to clean energy by digging a 10 kilometre deep lined and capped water well next to them, energy depends on how wide the well is bored, using Starlite as a wall paint etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what specific action you'd like. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
